abstract: Fifteen-year-old British boy pleads guilty to inciting terrorist attack in Australia in 2014; his sentencing is set for Sept 3.
lead_paragraph: The 15-year-old pleaded guilty to instigating a plan to attack against police officers in Australia.

headline.main: Britain: Boy Says He Tried to Incite a Terrorist Attack
headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: Boy Says He Tried to Incite a Terrorist Attack

snippet: The 15-year-old pleaded guilty to instigating a plan to attack against police officers in Australia.
